content: the snowman is the day 2 pattern in the mini amigurumi advent it is about 4 tall with a little top hat and scarf made with worsted weight yarn and a g hook sample used red heart super saver the mini amigurumi advent includes 24 amigurumi patterns for christmas ranging from 3 -6 tall the snowman is available free on my blog as part of the mini amigurumi advent or available for purchase in the mini amigurumi advent ebook
